title: GoSYNQ
description: Zero-fee ticketing for event promoters. The anti-Eventbrite. Built landing pages, Stripe integration, QR scanning, and audience database. Saves promoters 10-15% in platform fees while giving them full ownership of their audience.

title: AI Operator Roadmap
description: Free course: Zero to AI consultant. 15 comprehensive modules teaching people to build AI systems and start consulting. Three learning paths, project-based, 100% free. No fluff, just practical skills.

title: Modern Portfolio Template
description: A jaw-dropping portfolio template with 3D elements, smooth animations, and a content management system. Perfect for developers and designers.

title: Fitness Tracker App
description: A beautiful fitness tracking app with workout plans, progress charts, and social features. Built with React Native.
